footer.description: Engineering durable, high‑performance industrial solutions across heavy equipment, hydraulics, and electrical systems—trusted since 1948.

home.heroSubtitle: Sanat Mansoor (SMC) leads with over 1,000 groundbreaking projects across seven product segments.
home.brandsDesc: Three specialized brands deliver end‑to‑end industrial solutions across heavy equipment, high‑pressure hydraulics, and electrical systems.
home.industriesDesc: With more than 50 years of experience, Sanat Mansoor has gained the technical expertise in delivering industrial solutions for virtually every industry.
home.steelDesc: Bearings, rollers, crushers, and complete line equipment.
home.miningDesc: Crushers, HPGR systems, and hydraulic tools for extreme conditions.
home.oilGasDesc: High-pressure hydraulic and electrical solutions for safety-critical operations.
home.powerDesc: Components and systems that keep power plants running.
home.whyChooseDesc: With over 75 years of family-owned expertise, we craft solutions that thrive in the toughest industries.
home.durabilityDesc: High-performance tools (up to 1,500 bar) and resilient electrical systems, engineered for safety and long-term reliability in harsh environments.
home.precisionDesc: Tailored designs from SAMIE's machinery to SAMEE's cable systems, optimized for steel, mining, and energy challenges with unmatched adaptability.
home.innovationDesc: Over 1,000 pioneering projects, including first-of-their-kind solutions for global leaders, showcasing our commitment to cutting-edge excellence.
home.partnershipDesc: A team of 200+ specialists and strategic alliances, like the Esfarayen Industrial Complex, delivering integrated support for your unique industrial needs.
home.capabilitiesDesc: From concept to commissioning, Sanat Mansoor delivers solutions built on engineering excellence:
home.machiningDesc: Precision and large-scale capabilities for complex parts.
home.castingDesc: Advanced foundry operations for critical industrial components.
home.reverseEngDesc: Extending the life of equipment through innovation.
home.aboutTitle: Built on Excellence, Driven by Innovation
home.aboutText1: For over five decades, Sanat Mansoor has been at the forefront of manufacturing excellence. We combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver solutions that exceed expectations.
home.aboutText2: Our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted partner for industries ranging from aerospace to automotive, energy to electronics.
home.aboutText3: With facilities across three continents and a team of world-class engineers, we're positioned to handle projects of any scale and complexity.
home.catalogsDesc: Explore our latest catalogs to learn more about our products and services.
home.readyStartDesc: Get in touch with our team to discuss your manufacturing needs
home.footerDesc: Engineering durable, high‑performance industrial solutions across heavy equipment, hydraulics, and electrical systems—trusted since 1948.
home.sameeItem3: Sirens for safe and durable operation

about.title: About Sanat Mansoor
about.subtitle: Over 75 Years of Industrial Excellence
about.intro: Sanat Mansoor stands as a beacon of industrial innovation and manufacturing excellence. Since our founding, we have been committed to delivering world-class solutions that power the world's most demanding industries.
about.historyDesc: Founded in 1948, Sanat Mansoor has grown from a small workshop to a global industrial powerhouse. Our journey is marked by continuous innovation, unwavering commitment to quality, and deep partnerships with industry leaders.
about.missionDesc: To engineer and deliver durable, high-performance industrial solutions that exceed expectations and drive progress in the world's toughest industries.
about.visionDesc: To be the trusted partner of choice for industrial solutions, recognized globally for innovation, quality, and customer-centric excellence.
about.qualityDesc: Uncompromising standards in every product and service.
about.partnershipDesc: Strong relationships built on trust and mutual success.
about.sustainabilityDesc: Responsible practices for a better future.
about.teamDesc: With over 200 specialists across multiple disciplines, our team brings decades of combined expertise to every project.
about.facilitiesDesc: State-of-the-art manufacturing and engineering centers across three continents.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help with your industrial needs
contact.name: Full Name

samie.heroSubtitle: Over 50 years of engineering excellence in complex machinery and equipment for the world's most demanding industries
samie.capabilitiesDesc: From cutting-edge design to collaborative innovation and hydraulic mastery, we deliver robust solutions that stand the test of time.
samie.solutionsDesc: Proven industrial equipment and machinery designed for maximum performance and reliability
samie.ctaDesc: Contact our SAMIE team to explore custom machinery solutions tailored to your industrial needs
samie.cap1Desc: Our team of highly qualified engineers leverages cutting-edge design principles and advanced software to create robust and efficient solutions that operate flawlessly under rigorous conditions.
samie.cap2Desc: Through strategic partnerships, like the Esfarayen Industrial Complex Special Consortium, we foster innovation in public-private collaborations for cutting-edge machinery.
samie.cap3Desc: We design and manufacture hydraulic circuits, custom cylinders, and components for key industries. Our POWERMAN brand offers high-pressure (700 and 1,500 bar) tools and equipment.
samie.cap4Desc: We create solid frameworks, precise actuation systems, and lightweight yet durable structures to withstand demanding conditions.
samie.cap5Desc: Using state-of-the-art CNC centers, we achieve exceptional accuracy in components of all sizes, reducing wear and extending lifespan.
samie.cap6Desc: Via our Felez Taban subsidiary, we produce high-performance alloy components for mining, built to withstand extreme wear.
samie.cap7Desc: Our certified technicians use cutting-edge techniques to ensure structural integrity, minimizing distortion and maximizing strength.
samie.sol1Desc: Over 700 backup chocks and 1,100+ bearings and bushings for Mobarakeh Steel Company, providing low-friction support for rotating shafts.
samie.sol2Desc: Re-engineered models (1,000-5,000 kg lifting capacity) for streamlined liner replacement in industrial applications.
samie.sol3Desc: Production of complex spare parts and equipment used in the Oil & Gas industry, Steel, Cement, and Compost companies, as well as Power Plants.
samie.sol4Desc: Manufacturing & repairment of various Bearings, Chocks, and Bushes in different sizes.
samie.sol5Desc: Manufacturing of Cone Crushers for mining and industrial applications.
samie.sol6Desc: Manufacturing of Machines, Frames, and Rollers for Pickling and Recoiling Lines.
samie.sol7Desc: Over 80 enhanced units utilizing high pressure for efficient grinding, energy savings, and consistent output.
samie.sol8Desc: Custom-designed to meet unique industrial requirements.
samie.sol9Desc: Complete lines integrating with your infrastructure, like the reverse-engineered 2,500-ton rollers and equipment for Mobarakeh Steel's pickling and recoiling line.

powerman.heroSubtitle: Reliable, Durable, and Safe High-Pressure Hydraulic Equipment for any application requiring applied force
powerman.collectionsDesc: An extensive range of tools to ensure that even your most demanding application can be undertaken with the highest degree of safety and accuracy.
powerman.featuresDesc: High-power hydraulic solutions designed for precision, portability, and maximum operational uptime.
powerman.applicationsDesc: Delivering energy savings and reduced downtime in hazardous environments across multiple industries
powerman.ctaDesc: Contact our POWERMAN team to explore hydraulic tools and equipment for your specific application

samee.heroTitle: Outlets & Plugs, Cable Trolleys, Alarm Sirens
samee.heroSubtitle: SAMEE combines the widest selection of industrial sockets and plugs, sirens, and cable festoon systems with reliability, durability, and built-in safety.
samee.categoriesDesc: Designed to make it easy to find the right equipment for any application, from sockets and plugs to cable festoon systems.
samee.featuresDesc: Robust electrical solutions with IP-rated protection, corrosion resistance, and easy installation for high-load environments.
samee.applicationsDesc: Ensuring safety and operational uptime in challenging industrial conditions across multiple sectors
samee.ctaDesc: Contact our SAMEE team to explore electrical equipment and systems for your industrial facility
